text: Edward Jack Peter Westwick (born 27 June 1987) is an English actor and musician. He is best known for his role as Chuck Bass on The CW's teen television drama series Gossip Girl (2007â€“2012). In November 2017, two women accused Westwick of raping them and another accused him of sexually assaulting her. The Los Angeles Police Department investigated the allegations. On August 23, 2024, Westwick married Indian actress Amy Jackson. ==References== ==Other websites== * * PopGurls Interview: Ed Westwick Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Hertfordshire Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English rock musicians Category:English rock singers Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Musicians from London Category:People from Stevenage Category:Singers from London Category:Writers from London
